name: The Great Slime Escapes
description:
Made for: Brackeys Game Jam #5

Theme: Stronger Together

A slime sibling got kidnap by a group of knights to use for their "practice target". Help them escape from these horrible knights by activating the door triggers.

Controls: AWSD or Arrow Keys

Tools Use:  Godot, Aseprite, sfxr.

Created by Mikato Lee
